title: Ethanol is undergoing regulatory scrutiny in Europe: why this matters
description: Ethanol is the most common incredient in the hand rubs that we use to sanitise our hands in hospitals and in homes; it is also found in a range of products that we use on a regular basis - including chemicals, pharmaceuticals, petroleum, and perfumes. In Europe, ethanol is being considered for classification as both a carcinogen and a reprotoxic substance. However, ethanol-based hand rubs are a primary defence against healthcare-related infections, and any disruption to their use would have an immediate impact on patient outcomes

description: Wing Commander Shivangi Singh, India's sole woman Rafale pilot, gained national attention as President Droupadi Murmu experienced a historic sortie in the fighter jet. Singh, part of the elite Golden Arrows squadron, flew the French-made aircraft from Ambala Air Force Station. President Murmu described the flight as "unforgettable," boosting her pride in India's defense capabilities.

title: 8th Pay Commission: How much salary hike should central govt staff expect?
description: 8th Pay Commission salary hike news: Central government employees and pensioners have reason to cheer as the Cabinet approves the terms of reference for the 8th Pay Commission. New salary and pension levels are expected to be effective from January 1, 2026. The commission will assess pay structures and post-retirement benefits, with its report due in 12-18 months.

NITI Aayog report: Service sector surges; jobs trail growth
description: India's booming services sector, contributing over half of national output, faces a reality check. Despite job growth, employment remains largely informal and low-paying, creating a paradox of strong output without quality jobs. Regional and gender disparities are stark, with a growing mismatch between education and job quality, demanding targeted policies for inclusive growth.

This incident follows the Canadian government's designation of the Bishnoi syndicate as a terrorist entity.

A Cessna aircraft released flares over the capital, marking the third such experiment since Independence. This initiative, a collaboration with IIT Kanpur, aims to leverage technology against the city's persistent air pollution crisis.

Kidnapped twice in Colombia due to payment issues, he preferred prison over the treacherous journey. Sardhania was apprehended at Delhi's IGI Airport upon his arrival.

title: Bengaluru man kills lover’s 7-year-old daughter for disturbing privacy
description: A 26-year-old man was arrested for allegedly murdering his girlfriend's seven-year-old daughter. The accused reportedly killed the child, a class 2 student, because she was a "disturbance" to his private time with her mother. He confessed to repeatedly slamming the child's head on the floor and smothering her.

title: 'Husband died waiting to see Vijay': Karur stampede victim's wife rejects TVK relief; returns Rs 20L
description: A family of a stampede victim has returned Rs 20 lakh relief from the TVK party, citing deep disappointment. They were angered that the party took estranged relatives to meet their leader, Vijay, instead of offering personal condolences. The family felt their name was misused, leading to the return of the funds via bank transfer.

title: ‘Tough timing’: GM axes 200 salaried staff; layoffs hit days after profit surge
description: General Motors has let go of over 200 salaried employees, mainly CAD engineers, at its Michigan tech campus. This move, part of a restructuring to boost profits, follows strong third-quarter earnings and a raised financial outlook. GM stated the layoffs target execution roles to enhance core design capabilities. This comes as the automotive sector sees broader workforce reductions.

title: Blake Lively–Justin Baldoni legal drama twists as Taylor Swift, Kelce stay away
description: Blake Lively's legal battle with Justin Baldoni has reportedly strained her friendship with Taylor Swift. Lively's legal team accuses Baldoni of withholding evidence, while Swift has remained distant. Sources suggest Lively fears the fallout could impact her and Ryan Reynolds' careers, as Swift's influence in Hollywood is immense.
